message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take a bit more considering the inflation disparity.
Your turn Alice. I need a bit more than that to make it worthwhile.
I'm holding my ground on this one, Bob. Time is ticking for both of us.

Bob, let's be realistic.  50/50 is not fair with the inflation working against you more than me.  This is my final offer.
